name: MultiNews
0:
”Alexa, ask Multi news for headlines”
”Polygon”
”Headline one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: multi news
des:
Allows you to get news from an array of sources, ranging from IGN to New Scientist. 

You ask for headlines from your selected source and then select which headline you would like to hear more detail for. You will then get a summarized version of the article read aloud and sent your Alexa companion app. 

Full list of supported sources: 
 - ABC News
 - Al Jazerra
 - Ars Technica
 - BBC Sport
 - BBC news
 - Bloomberg
 - Business Insider
 - Business Insider UK
 - Buzzfeed
 - CNBC
 - CNN
 - ESPN
 - ESPN Cric Info
 - Endgadget
 - Entertainment Weekly
 - Financial Times
 - Football Italia
 - Fortune
 - Four Four Two
 - Google
 - Hacker News
 - IGN
 - Independent
 - MTV News
 - MTV News UK
 - Mashable
 - Metro
 - Mirror
 - NFL News
 - National Geographic
 - New Scientist
 - New York Magazine
 - Newsweek
 - Polygon
 - Recode
 - Reddit
 - Reuters
 - TalkSport
 - TechCrunch
 - TechRadar
 - The Guardian AU
 - The Guardian UK
 - The Huffington post
 - The LAD bible
 - The New York Times
 - The Next Web
 - The Sport Bible
 - The Telegraph
 - The Verge
 - The Wall Street Journal
 - The Washington Post
 - Time
 - USA Today

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
